name: Sonic Riders: Tournament Edition
overview: SRTE is a mod of Sonic Riders that gears the game towards competitive play. This mod is being built on the belief that Sonic Riders was a sorely misunderstood game, and that its in-depth mechanics and skill ceiling actually have competitive potential as an esport. The mod continues to receive updates and support. More recent updates feature 6 new characters, new archetypes, and a new stage for the community as a whole.
